testcase.name: Successful user login process
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Successful user login process Given there are set of Users in Database ... passed in 0.075s | username | password | | peter | password123 | Given the base url is "https://localhost:8000" ... passed in 0.000s Given I open the site "/" ... passed in 0.463s When I set "peter" to the inputfield "//*[@id='id_username']" ... passed in 0.028s When I set "password123" to the inputfield "//*[@id='id_password']" ... passed in 0.025s When I click on the button "//button[@type='submit']" ... passed in 0.420s Then I expect that element "//*[text()[contains(.,'Successfully signed in.')]]" does exist ... passed in 0.005s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Failed user login process with wrong password
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Failed user login process with wrong password Given there are set of Users in Database ... passed in 0.101s | username | password | | peter | password123 | Given the base url is "https://localhost:8000" ... passed in 0.000s Given I open the site "/" ... passed in 0.396s When I set "peter" to the inputfield "//*[@id='id_username']" ... passed in 0.022s When I set "password1234" to the inputfield "//*[@id='id_password']" ... passed in 0.018s When I click on the button "//button[@type='submit']" ... passed in 0.218s Then I expect that element "//*[text()[contains(.,'Please enter a correct username and password. Note that both fields may be case-sensitive.')]]" does exist ... passed in 0.010s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Failed user login process with wrong username
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Failed user login process with wrong username Given there are set of Users in Database ... passed in 0.058s | username | password | | peter | password123 | Given the base url is "https://localhost:8000" ... passed in 0.000s Given I open the site "/" ... passed in 0.245s When I set "peter123" to the inputfield "//*[@id='id_username']" ... passed in 0.024s When I set "password123" to the inputfield "//*[@id='id_password']" ... passed in 0.018s When I click on the button "//button[@type='submit']" ... passed in 0.201s Then I expect that element "//*[text()[contains(.,'Please enter a correct username and password. Note that both fields may be case-sensitive.')]]" does exist ... passed in 0.009s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
